requests.name: Collects events on Position
requests.description: Collects every event near latitude and longitude and range based on the parameters.

requests.name: Delete tag from event
requests.description: Send the api-key and the auth token for validation within the header. Sends two parameters in the url. Event id to specify the event and tag id to specify which tag do delete.
